title: Does anyone have an extra ticket to the game tomorrow?
self_text: I just wanna say that it‚Äôs really cool how you can always find people on this app who are willing to help out in any way they can, but I also want to add a warning that you need to be careful when meeting strangers from online platforms! You don‚Äôt know what kind of people they might be and so if you ever feel uncomfortable or unsafe, do not hesitate to contact the authorities. If someone is trying to get you to meet them at a private place then call your parents or police immediately! Please take care of yourselves, stay safe and keep an open mind. Also if anyone has any advice for me for dealing with strangers on here please let me know :)
